word: He came saying, "I will declare Thy name unto My brethren: in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee." [See Psalms 22:22.] He placed Himself on a level with human beings, saying, "I will stand at the head of the race, that through My humiliation they may be accepted as members of the royal family. I will declare the name of God to My brethren. I will put My trust in Him, just as I desire My disciples to do."
